This is for people into the lore of OW.

A lot of points have already been mentioned but, The new writers are also erasing a couple that was established by a previous head writer (Genji x Mercy) . They've removed every Genji-Mercy voiceline interaction in the game, gave them 0 spawn interactions and have her be sounding condescending to him constantly, while so suddenly bombarding Pharah-Mercy interactions every patch so they can have their Raze-KJ moment for free clout whilst not understanding that you have to build something from the ground up and not just ERASE something because you need free internet points and exploit the LGBT community for it.

Also, it is hilarious how a majority of the women are constantly either downplaying the men cast, insulting them, etc whilst the majority of the men voicelines with the women are them coming off as if they have two functioning braincells, one that knows how to speak and another that express their idiocy. There are a few exceptions but goodness the writing has gone DOWNHILL in OW2. 

They even retconned the lore a handful of times to push their agendas and twist narratives but then create even more confusion. Im tired of blizzard pulling their stunts and as much as I want and need them to succeed, they CONSTANTLY want to shoot themselves in the foot.

As someone who very much loves Overwatch, This is bad, Do not play it.

Overwatch 2 is a predatory husk of what Overwatch once was, locking things such as Heroes behind 10$ paywalls (individually, might i add, if it was 10$ one time payment for all new heroes i probably wouldnt care that much)

Oh and the 20$ Invasion DLC does not work if you buy it on Steam, so theres that.

I actually have over 700h in the original Overwatch, Steam only tracked the 10 minutes I opened the game so I could leave a review.

The original game was great, but the 'new' Overwatch is an anti-consumer insult to players. Don't support this behavior, don't support Blizzard (also for their numerous other issues), don't play this game.
